TopicTitle: Need help with Infernal Robotics(looked evrywhere for answere)

Articles.Content: I recently installed infernal robotics. Everything works fine except i cant use anything in the game. It works in the builder but when i launch it comes up with OEC/s on all of the robotics. i have batteries and controls. heres a screenshot https://snag.gy/6XeHiM.jpg . help would be appreciated as i have spent ages looking all over the internet for an answer but havent found one
Robotics parts are not controlled through the right click menu. There should be a toolbar button that looks like a robotic arm. Click it and it will bring up the controls for the parts.
I have but there is a grey icon next to it not yellow green or red and when I press the button to move the part it does nothing. That what I put up is the only problem I believe I have found

Two questions for you:

Are you certain you properly extracted and installed the MagicSmokeIndustries file to the KSP Gamedata file?

Is it the latest version both game and mod releases?

If both are yes answers I'm as clueless as yourself.

I was recently relieved of a pesky bug in Infernal Robotic's in-editor settings resetting to default the moment of launch. The IR 2.0.5 release fixed that and I believe that's the most current version until Squad update KSP to v1.2.

Good luck!
here's the smokeandmirrors gamedata file and im on the latest version of both
